title: WTB: Red or Green Ty Cobb in Fair Condition
author: Pilot172000

posts.post_title: WTB: Red or Green Ty Cobb in Fair Condition
posts.post_content: I am wanting a Ty Cobb in Fair condition graded at a 1.5 but would consider a Lesser grade if the card looks good.  Would pay a little extra for a Sovereign back.

Bump...

There is a Red Cobb in Fair condition with a Old Mill Back on eBay.  It wouldn't by chance belong to someone on this board would it??

I have some trade materials and cash.
